nodes.text: Handy was a young Human male who lived on Cloud City during the Galactic Civil War. During the subjugation of Cloud City by Imperial forces in 3 ABY, Handy was truanting from school with his friend, Allania Jakien in the Ugnaught tunnels. While attempting to reach their parents, the pair came across a stormtrooper patrol. Handy was caught by one, to which he responded by kicking the stormtrooper in the face.
